LanguageData.MF_BasicFurniture.label: basic furniture
LanguageData.MF_BasicFurniture.description: Build simple furniture like simple beds, basic tables, stools, benches and more.
LanguageData.ComplexFurniture.label: complex furniture
LanguageData.ComplexFurniture.description: Build complex furniture like beds, end tables, dining chairs, armchairs, dressers, tool cabinets, billiard tables, and poker tables, vents, sarcophagi, and more.
LanguageData.MF_RoyalFurniture.label: artisan furniture
LanguageData.MF_RoyalFurniture.description: Build luxury furniture focused strongly on aesthetics and beauty over practicality, usually only seen in the houses of the wealthy elite. Including poster beds, royal chairs, tables and armchairs.
LanguageData.MF_ModernFurniture.label: modern furniture
LanguageData.MF_ModernFurniture.description: Learn to build furniture of the modern day that is focused on practicality over beauty, such as roulette tables, wardrobes, dart boards, punching bags and ergonomic beds.
LanguageData.MF_WasteDisposal.label: waste disposal
LanguageData.MF_WasteDisposal.description: Learn to build small and large bins, objects that slowly clean the environment they are in.
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.label: basic electronics
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.description: Build basic electronic joy sources such as tube televisions, industrial radios, arcades and more.
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision.label: complex electronics
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision.description: Build complex electronic joy sources such as flatscreen televisions, longwave radios and more.
